name: Aging
description: Immunity to the effects of aging.

name: Disease
description: Immunity to diseases.

name: Poison
description: Immunity to poisons.

name: Environmental Condition: Cold
description: Immunity to environmental cold.

name: Environmental Condition: Heat
description: Immunity to environmental heat.

name: Environmental Condition: High Pressure
description: Immunity to environmental high pressure.

name: Environmental Condition: Radiation
description: Immunity to environmental radiation.

name: Environmental Condition: Vacuum
description: Immunity to environmental vacuum.

name: Suffocation (One Type)
parameter_prompt: Specify type of suffocation immunity (e.g., Drowning, Specific Atmosphere)
description: Immunity to one specific type of suffocation (e.g., drowning).

name: Starvation and Thirst
description: Immunity to the need for food and water.

name: Need for Sleep
description: Immunity to the need for sleep.

name: Power Descriptor (Rare)
parameter_prompt: Specify rare power descriptor (e.g., own powers, sibling's powers)
description: Immunity to a rare power descriptor.

name: Critical Hits
description: Immunity to critical hits.

name: Suffocation (All)
description: Immunity to all suffocation effects (no need to breathe).

name: Power Descriptor (Uncommon)
parameter_prompt: Specify uncommon power descriptor (e.g., chemical, gravitic, necromantic)
description: Immunity to an uncommon power descriptor.

name: Alteration Effects
description: Immunity to effects that alter your form or traits (e.g., Transform, Weaken Shape).

name: Sensory Affliction Effects
parameter_prompt: Specify sense or all (e.g., Visual, Auditory, All Sensory Afflictions)
description: Immunity to Affliction effects targeting senses (choose one sense group or all sensory Afflictions for 5 ranks; specific individual sense might be less by GM call).

name: Emotion Effects
description: Immunity to effects that control or manipulate emotions.

name: Entrapment Effects
description: Immunity to effects that grab, snare, or bind.

name: Fatigue Effects
description: Immunity to effects that cause fatigue.

name: Interaction Skills
description: Immunity to being affected by interaction skills (Deception, Intimidation, Persuasion).

name: Damage (Specific Descriptor)
parameter_prompt: Specify damage descriptor (e.g., Bullets, Cold, Electricity, Falling, Fire, Magic, Radiation, Sonic)
description: Immunity to damage from a particular descriptor.

name: Power Descriptor (Common)
parameter_prompt: Specify common power descriptor (e.g., All Cold, Electricity, Fire, Radiation, or Weather effects)
description: Immunity to all effects with a common power descriptor.

name: Life Support
description: Immunity to disease, poison, all environmental conditions (cold, heat, high pressure, radiation, vacuum), suffocation (no need to breathe), and starvation and thirst.

name: Power Descriptor (Very Common)
parameter_prompt: Specify very common power descriptor (e.g., Bludgeoning, Energy)
description: Immunity to all effects with a very common power descriptor.

name: All Fortitude Effects
description: Immunity to all effects requiring a Fortitude resistance check.

name: All Will Effects
description: Immunity to all effects requiring a Will resistance check.

name: All Toughness Effects
description: Immunity to all effects requiring a Toughness resistance check (equivalent to Impervious Toughness at Rank 40).
